TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON . The respondent Government are represented by PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant 's husband was killed in a sobering - up centre No . CARDINAL in Novokuznetsk ( медвытрезвитель № CARDINAL г. ORG ) by negligent behaviour of Mr PERSON , another detainee .
On DATE PERSON was convicted by LOC of the negligent manslaughter .
Shortly after the conviction the applicant brought civil proceedings for damages against Mr G.
On DATE the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk awarded her a lump - sum compensation and DATE payments . ORG appealed .
On DATE ORG reversed the judgment of DATE and remitted the case for fresh examination by the district court .

On DATE , in the new proceedings , the applicant requested the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk to replace the defendant by ORG of Novokuznetsk ( ORG внутренних дел г. ORG ) which was in charge of the sobering - up centre . In its judgment of the same date the court decided that the damages should be paid by PERSON PERSON and ORG of Novokuznetsk in equal shares .

On DATE ORG reversed on appeal the judgment of DATE due to incorrect calculation and a lack of legal grounds for civil liability of the sobering - up centre . It remitted the case for fresh examination by the first instance court .
On DATE the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk ordered ORG of Novokuznetsk to pay the damages to the applicant . This judgment was appealed against by LOC .
On DATE ORG reversed on appeal the judgment of DATE and remitted the case for fresh examination by the first instance court .

On DATE the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk awarded the applicant damages to be paid both by ORG PERCENT ) and by PERSON PERSON ( PERCENT ) . ORG appealed , claiming that the damages were to be charged from the municipal , not federal budget . PERSON also appealed .
On DATE ORG upheld on appeal the judgment of DATE .
On DATE the applicant was informed that the enforcement of the judgment was stayed pending the supervisory review proceedings .
On DATE the President of ORG lodged a request for a supervisory review of the judgment ( протест на решение суда , вступившее в законную силу , an extraordinary appeal ) .

On DATE the Presidium of ORG granted the extraordinary appeal and quashed the judgment as it had found the ORG 's liability in this case “ disputable ” . It remitted the case for fresh examination by the district court .
On DATE the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk awarded a part of the damages to be paid to by ORG PERCENT ) and another part by Mr PERSON ( PERCENT ) .

On DATE ORG reversed on appeal the judgment of DATE for lack of legal grounds for civil liability of the sobering - up centre . It remitted the case for fresh examination by the first instance court .
On DATE ORG of Novokuznetsk granted the applicant 's request to stay the proceedings .

On DATE the applicant sent a letter to the Zavodskoy ORG of Novokuznetsk . It follows from its context that the court had notified the applicant about the resumption of the proceedings . The applicant , however , was opposed to the continuation of the trial and insisted that the proceedings would remain stayed until ORG had decided on the admissibility and the merits of her application .

On DATE the ORG of Kemerovo nevertheless resumed the proceedings . The applicant expressly waived any claims against PERSON but reiterated her claims against the ORG . In its judgment of DATE the court found that no fault or negligence of the sobering - up centre staff had been established in the criminal proceedings concerning the death of the applicant 's husband , hence there were no statutory grounds to impose civil liability on the ORG . The court refused to award damages against the ORG and found that they could be awarded against Mr. G , but for the applicant 's express refusal to sue him .
On DATE ORG upheld on appeal the judgment of DATE .
